english.segment1: Be still, there is a healer. His love is deeper than the sea. His mercy, it is unfailing. His arms are a fortress for the weak
english.segment2: Let faith arise. Let faith arise
english.segment3: I lift my hands to believe again. You are my refuge, You are my strength. As I pour out my heart, these things I remember. You are faithful, God, forever
english.segment4: Be still, there is a river. That flows from Calvary's tree. A fountain for the thirsty. Pure grace that washes over me
english.segment5: So let faith arise. Let faith arise. Open my eyes. Open my eyes
english.segment6: I lift my hands to believe again. You are my refuge, You are my strength. As I pour out my heart, these things I remember. You are faithful, God. You are faithful, God, forever
